Definition.WordDefinition: Wiener n 1: United States mathematician and founder of cybernetics (1894-1964) [syn: {Norbert Wiener}] 2: a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked; often served on a bread roll [syn: {frank}, {frankfurter}, {hotdog}, {hot dog}, {dog}, {wienerwurst}, {weenie}]
